SomaticFeaturemap.num_shards.description: Number of shards for splitting the interval list.

SomaticFeaturemap.pad_size.description: Size of padding to add to the positions of variants defined as tumor-PASS in somatic-pileup-featuremap.

SomaticFeaturemap.references.description: Input reference genome file, index file and dict.

SomaticFeaturemap.run_mpileup_override.description: If true, run the mpileup step.

SomaticFeaturemap.scatter_intervals_brea.description: Break scatter intervals at multiples of this value.

SomaticFeaturemap.sfm_xgb_model.description: XGBoost model file for somatic featuremap pileup scoring.

SomaticFeaturemap.somatic_featuremap_giv.description: If provided, use this somatic featuremap file instead of generating a new one.
If provided, use this somatic featuremap index file instead of generating a new one.
